title: Major (Honours Program)
desc: This major requires the completion of 20.00 credits. At least 1.00 of these credits must be obtained from the completion of Liberal Education electives.

Students who are lacking one 4U /grade 12 course in Biology, Chemistry or Physics must take the equivalent introductory course in first semester. The required first-year science courses in that subject should be completed according to the revised schedule of studies available at: https://www.uoguelph.ca/bsc/revised_SS
footnotes: Students who have taken physics courses other than IPS*1500 Integrated Mathematics and Physics I or PHYS*1080 Physics for Life Sciences in Semester 1 and IPS*1510 Integrated Mathematics and Physics II or PHYS*1010 Introductory Electricity and Magnetism in Semester 2, may proceed to semester 3 with the permission of the Department of Physics
